name: PageSpeed Insights Dashboard worker
description: A ruby script that fetches PSI data

PSI_DASHBOARD_GITHUB_REPO.description: Your clone of PSI Dashboard Github repo

PSI_DASHBOARD_FOLDER.description: Folder name of your clone, should be page-speed-insights-dashboard

PSI_URLS.description: A comma separated list of URLS: https://www.foo.bar,https://www.bar.foo

SSH_KEY.description: A private SSH key you've generated
